experience.title: Graduate Researcher/Teaching Assistant
achievements: Apply reinforcement learning-based control for fault recovery on aircraft.
Process clinical surveys by feature selection, clustering, and classification to diagnose genetic disorders.
Mentor 7 engineering design teams over the year for their capstone project.

experience.title: Research Intern
achievements: Studied formation of dark matter halos in galaxies via high performance computer simulations.
Developed algorithms to fit particle clouds to ellipsoids to verify Cold Dark Matter models of halo formation.
Wrote a multiprocessor compatible data mining library to visualize 3.7TB of n-body physics simulation output.
Developed tools to generate animated snapshots of halo evolution.
Analyzed particle distributions in different halo finder protocols (AHF, Rockstar).

experience.title: Business Intelligence Intern
achievements: Programmed SQL procedures to consolidate 40 million overlapping transactions into 1.5 million records.
Rewrote periodic table back-up procedures to eliminate redundancies and reduced backup sizes by 75%.

experience.title: Student Helpdesk Assistant
achievements: Diagnosed and troubleshot computer, smartphone, and campus wide IT issues.
Recovered $3000 worth of accidentally deleted data from hard drives.
Assisted students in setting up course-specific applications on their computers.

experience.title: Research Intern
achievements: Researched effects of solar and cosmic radiation on memory chips in space.
Designed an interface in VHDL on a FPGA to test SRAM chips for single event upsets after irradiation.
Documented code and interface operation procedures for use by graduate student researchers.

experience.title: Instructor
experience.workplace: Android Application Development Workshop - NUST, Pakistan
achievements: Organized a week-long workshop attended by 40 professionals and graduate and undergraduate students.
Taught basic application development skills for Android using MIT AppInventor to attendees with diverse technical skillsets.
Mentored teams for final day projects and provided one-on-one guidance.

projects.title: QLearning
projects.description: A library for modeling continuous and discrete systems with faults, applying temporal difference learning algorithms for real-time control, and visualizing and benchmarking performance.

projects.title: PoorMansNN
projects.description: Dimension-agnostic dense feed forward neural network library with minimal dependencies. Modular and extensible structure with comprehensive documentation.

projects.title: imgurPCA v2
projects.description: Parsing comments on imgur.com for principal component analysis. Parsed comments are pre-processed for feature selection before being passed for analysis and later clustering.

projects.title: SatTrack
projects.description: A simple, easy to use library for visualizing satellite paths, predicting future passes, and tracking satellite trajectories using servo motors. Developed for Institute for Space and Defense Electronics - Software Defined Radio (ISDE-SDR) project at Vanderbilt.

extracurriculars.title: Resident Advisor
description: Identified residents facing academic or  personal challenges and provided support.
Arranged recreational and educational events like movie nights and talks in collaboration with campus organizations to serve a community of 700 residents.

extracurriculars.title: Mentor and Technical Specialist - Vanderbilt Design Studio
description: Maintained and repaired 3D printers, electronics, and tools at the Design Studio.
Assisted users in design process with Makerbot Desktop and Autodesk 123D Design.

extracurriculars.title: AcFee Subcommittee for Cultural Organizations
